trans-unit.source: Represents a converter that converts the dimensions of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control into a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示的维度转换的转换器<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>控制<xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> created by this converter applies an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OpacityMask%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> so that it does not appear in the area defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>创建此转换器将应用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OpacityMask%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>，以便不会显示在定义为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox></xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>的区域</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OpacityMask%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.BorderGapMaskConverter"></xref> class.
Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref> that draws the border for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control.

The three numbers that are in the `values` parameter represent the following <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> control parameters: - The width of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: 中的三个数字`values`参数表示以下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>控制参数:-的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox><xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration provides a graphical representation of the `values` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下图提供的图形表示形式`values`参数。

trans-unit.source: ![A GroupBox and the valiues for the Convert method](~/add/media/bordergapmaskconverterillustration.png "A GroupBox and the valiues for the Convert method")
trans-unit.target: ![GroupBox 以及用于 Convert 方法的值](~/add/media/bordergapmaskconverterillustration.png "GroupBox 以及用于 Convert 方法的值")

trans-unit.source: An array of three numbers that represent the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control parameters.
trans-unit.target: 表示的三个数字数组<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>控制参数。
有关详细信息，请参阅备注。

trans-unit.source: The width of the visible line to the left of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可见的行的左侧的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>中<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref> that draws the border around a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control that includes a gap for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"> </xref>绘制的边框<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>控件，其中包含的差距<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>
